crew.p: Idea, choreography, dancers: Agate Bankava, Andris Kačanovskis
Producer: Evija Sedola, Ģertrūdes ielas teātris

body.p: Our interest is about the time that is still to come, while in our eyes time runs away. At a time when we often look back to our history and compare it with today’s events, there is not enough time and space for fantasy about the future. Roots are important, but equally important are the illusions, fantasies and dreams of the future world. What will happen when we will not be here, or will we be, because we will find the gene of eternal life?
